547800.name: Fantasy Grounds - Darkwoulfe's Token Pack Volume 23
547800.description:
Darkwoulfe's Token Pack volume 23

Created by Riley D. Owens (aka Darkwoulfe), this product consists of 57 top-down uniquely designed, 3d rendered tokens, depicting heroes, villains and monsters. You can use these to replace the letter tokens or built-in tokens in many popular adventure modules. Just unlock the encounters and drag these over top or drag them over top of the listing in your combat tracker.
This Token Pack includes:
  • Banker
  • Buffalo Soldier Calvary Riding
  • Buffalo Soldier Calvary Standing
  • Buffalo Soldier Calvaryman with Pistol
  • Buffalo Soldier Calvaryman with Rifle
  • Buffalo Soldier Dead
  • Buffalo Soldier Down
  • Buffalo Soldier Riding
  • Buffalo Soldier Standing
  • Buffalo Soldier with Pistol
  • Buffalo Soldier with Rifle
  • Cookie
  • Cowboy Gambler in Beige
  • Cowboy Gambler in Green
  • Cowboy Gambler in Red
  • Cowgirl Gambler in Beige
  • Cowgirl Gambler in Blue
  • Cowgirl Gambler in Yellow
  • Cowgirl Gunman in Beige
  • Cowgirl Gunman in Blue
  • Cowgirl Gunman in Red
  • Cowgirl Gunman in Yellow
  • Dealer
  • Joseph
  • Julien
  • Lin Mai
  • Louise
  • Marshall Couzins Down
  • Marshall Couzins Fighting
  • Marshall Couzins Riding
  • Marshall Couzins Standing
  • Marshall Couzins with Pistol
  • Marshall Couzins with Rifle
  • Minnie Sue
  • Old West Samurai
  • One Eyed Jack
  • Proprietor
  • Railroad Conductor
  • Sadie Mae
  • Saloon Bartender
  • Schoolmarm
  • Sleeping Saloon Drunk
  • Southwestern Gambler in Sombrero
  • Southwestern Pistolier Down

  • Southwestern Pistolier Standing
  • Southwestern Pistolier with Sawed Off Shotgun Riding
  • Southwestern Pistolier with Sawed Off Shotgun

  • Stagecoach Mary fighting
  • Stagecoach Mary Knocked Out
  • Stagecoach Mary Riding 2

  • Stagecoach Mary
  • Teller

Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:

Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
